review_text: the approach and the information are based on science not on fads or trying to sell you something the  ability to see how my body reacted to different foods combinations or time of day was fascinating and i learnt a lot although it revealed that i didnt do well with bread and pasta which i love i was able to adapt my diet relatively easily and now i have these as treats rather than staples  and enjoy them more it also showed that it is best to have a varied diet rather than eat the same things all the time and i have become much more adventurous in mixing things in salads stews stir fries etc what is most impressive is that i dont feel the need to snack  and that i have lost weight around my middle without trying it has really changed my approach to food and diet the one thing that could be improved is the chat function  my questions are always answered eventually but perhaps rephrase how you describe it so as not to suggest it is a live chat which is probably what most people are used to  even if they are from bots
Label: Positive

review_text: i have been working with a nutritionist called harriet she is amazing she has been flexible to have telephone calls around my schedule and very personcentred in terms of my food preferences she has sent me a list of recipes which is around my food preference and to overcome challenges in my food preparation she has also sent me many educational resources that i previously was not aware of i am also now aware of how much protein and fibre i should be having daily to maintain a balanced diet she is prompt in her delivery and communication she checks in on me when i have gone quiet to ensure that i am still on track with my journey and has helped me to get back on track when i have struggled she also works in a compassionate approach where the change is gradual so it doesnt feel overwhelming as well as all the amazing tasty recipes and all the other useful videos and articles etc having a nutritionist by my side to guide me is my favourite thing about zoe i would highly recommend zoe to anyone very worth the money

review_text: i have been on the zoe journey since kate spring and have gradually changed my diet with encouragement every step of the way i feel full all the time i dont have blood sugar drops anymore and i have lost just over a stone in weight i wish this had been discovered years ago the advice is invaluable and the app excellent especially for using when shopping as it has a barcode checker to find how good that particular food is for you as an individual ive had a retest of my gut microbe and the good bacteria has increased dramatically i feel more energetic no brain fog and much healthier imogen has been recently been  helping me in the research community hub and has been invaluable its an amazing journey and i hope it can be made more widely available to people on a lower income i didnt have any hesitation in paying for the app as it cost no more than going to slimming world or weight watchers per month but the initial tests cost  would be difficult for many people although when you see the box of equipment you know why it cost that much i highly recommend zoe for optimum health
Label: Positive

review_text: i joined zoe to learn how to eat healthier so that i can be fit  full of energy to run around after my grandchild it is a challenge changing your eating habits  learning about how to combine foods for better gut health the program is very informative with lessons that gradually introduce you to new ideas  teach you what is personally best for you however i had lots of questions  i found that i really didnt like the taste of tofu although it was good for me  didnt know how to use pearl barley  bulgar wheat in a tasty interesting way so lucy came to my rescue zoe provides an excellent chatmessage support forum where you can ask questions  one of their dieticians will answer your questions lucy was the dietician who supported me she gave me loads of tips  ideas for recipes with pearl barley  bulgar wheat she answered all my questions  gave me alternatives to eat instead of tofu she even helped me when i was finding it difficult to make my healthy meals  cook something different for my husband she gave me meal suggestions with a healthy twist that we could both enjoy eating together joining zoe really feels like being part of a community they support you every step of the way all you have to do is stick at it  ask for help when you need it
Label: Positive

review_text: so i made a bad late night mistake of signing up without properly researching so the waste of money is on me  my review is based on the content of this app and the customer service  on the content im only two days in so perhaps more features get unlocked as you go but so far its sole offering is daily lessons which defined procrastination and perfectionism poorly and very obviously asked me to define my mood by selecting one of 6 options access to focus tools which is just 6 relaxing sounds oceans white noise etc given me access to an area to write notes  access to some poor quizzes which frankly just describe some symptoms of anxietydepression and then gives you a score and a couple of pointers which arent that helpful or insightful google would do a better jobnote they lock the lessons to one a day so you cant move forward at a quicker pace or find one that may be helpful to you now  the first two lessons added zero value to me as so simplisticthat is honestly it not exactly ground breaking stuff ridiculously expensive for what it is  perhaps this is a tool designed for kids as thats the level its pitched atso on customer service i was so completely underwhelmed i reach out to customer service to ask if i could cancel because the app was so underwhelming they responded by saying sorry you quit not quite what i was doing nor the languageresponse youd expect from a business touting its know how on productivity and said that they had cancelled my accountnot sure if language challenges or just poor customer service but checked again and gave them an opportunity to do something before posting a review but they rather another poor review agree with all the feedback on transparency they obviously cant demofree trial the app as no one would sign upunless you are 612yo suggest not using this app

review_text: i have been taking part in the zoe programme for about 2 months now  to start the tests and results were very interesting and made me look more closely at what i was eating  from the lessons and the monitoring i have radically changed what i eat and when i eat it and in the last few weeks i have started to notice a difference in my body and how i feel  it has been a slow change but nevertheless it is a change  i am less bloated and crave sugar less i have also lost weight for the first time in years and managed to keep it off even after two holidays  i love the food and lessons but do find it hard to keep adding my foods each day although it is necessary to get the weekly feedback and ensure my scores are kept high if i have a criticism it is that the weekly feedback tells you were you are going wrong but does not give personalised feedback on what you have eaten that has caused the low scores overall i love the programme and am learning so much about how to eat to make my body healthier for the future without restricting myself
Label: Positive

review_text: i have worked with various birth control companies in the past such as simple health the pill club and nurx ive had glowing experiences i heard of hello alpha and i wanted to see what it was about i recently checked out the website and filled in my info like i have with the other birth control companies however their site seemed to obviously be different when i was looking through options and filling out the account info i got a message and realized the site sent a request for birth control before the healthcare provider could consult with me about any kind of birth control i informed her of the mistake and asked her to immediately withdrawal my request as i did not want to be unnecessarily charged for services i didnt want or need she immediately got back to me and said that everything would be handled that was the 22nd i then went and deleted my credit card information off the site and tried to also delete my account as i have never had an experience like that through the other companies i used and i wasnt feeling great about it i then get an alert on the 23 after i got confirmation that my request had been cancelled from my bank saying that i was charged 10 i reached out to them because that clearly had to be a mistake i didnt even consult with the healthcare provider i was told that i could not be refunded and to think of it like a onetime doctors visit i understand the sentiment but like i said i didnt actually talk to the provider about anything with other companies ive used you actually talk about what youre looking for what you arent side effects your previous birth control preferences then decide on the right choice for you then everything is laid out for you and you can confirm your order after all the information including cost is mentioned i have used many of these sites i am always diligent with looking at everything i did not see anything that said i would be charged 10 or to process my order i have talked to the company and they maintain that it is there and when i filled out that information with those questions by submitting it i accepted the cost they also maintain that the onetime fee was there sorry but i dont think i wouldve missed that if i did then it must have been well hidden even if i did and it was in finer printer or an oversight i let them know immediately of the mistake and asked for a refund i did not order anything from their company wouldnt the right thing to do be to simply refund me back i didnt think it would be such a difficult task to reach out and let them know an error happened and if it could be fixed instead it seems clear that wont happen from talking to them online to over the phone it was way too hard to reach a resolution if i had actually used the services or had the birth control shipped then i could understand but this all seems very unsettling to be charged all because i wanted to explore a new birth control site furthermore on the 22nd i deleted my payment information i refreshed the page to double check and it was gone somehow though it was saved then on the 23rd the day after i was charged that sounds very suspicious the agent i talked to said i dont have to worry about any future payments because it was all taken care of and then when i went to check my payment options the credit card was back up there theres no way i can trust their company to be my potential birth control provider in the future i have never had anything like this happen with any of the popular birth control companies ive worked with i urge you to use any of the companies ive listed theyre great whenever ive had any problems with anything from shipping to charges they have quickly and happily solved the issues if this was any of them i wouldve had a refund the same day no questions asked do yourself a favor go with the other companies i mentioned because i definitely wouldnt recommend this one
Label: Negative

review_text: they definitely delete the bad reviews you can take a lot of time to write a detailed history about what is going on but they have a ton of patients and little time so really theyre just sending you automated recommendations for the answers you fill out on a survey i have a complicated infection and saw a physician who began treating me but it was costly and took a lot of time they clearly just pressed reviewed or clicked a box and didnt read the detailed information i provided about why my infection didnt respond to prior treatment so that i could receive a customized treatment to be realistic they cant offer customized care with such a high volume and i understand a appreciate that but i wish this was made clear i even sent a message about a symptom and my answers from the provider were obviously just automated responses and werent at all specific to me for example it says to take a test that ive already taken and clearly stated is negative im positive they will delete this review but hope people are aware before spending 40 that you will not be getting customized care if you have insurance and are able it might be more worthwhile to spend a similar amount on a copay for a telehealth visit with a provider who actually cares about your symptoms history and the context of your case

review_text: i started zoe for about six weeks now and i am feeling fantastic zoe has been a sure way so far in monitoring my food intake and has helped me to make major lifestyle changes zoe is an individualized based program that measured my blood glucose microbiome and blood fat levels which is assessed in the beginning of the program through a tester kit with the results i was given and continued guidance through the zoe app i am confident in the zoe program as it is based on evidence based research and i also work in the health field and know how reasearch plays an important role to lifestyle change and health i appreciate the predicted scored detail on the foods i plan to eat daily which can be monitored just by scanning in anticipated food in the zoe app it has helped me a lot in knowing the value of the food i plan to eat zoe was recommended to me by a nurse practitioner friend of mine and i mainly started it because i wanted to start on a program that was sustainable i knew that changing my lifestyle through diet exercise and managing my microbiome was important to maintaining health i also appreciate all the information on health from zoe on youtube zoe is highly recommended because it provides me with individualized results
Label: Positive

review_text: i really like the test kit and although test day is time intensive i was excited to think that my results would be insightful and personal to me i really enjoyed the blood sugar monitoring for that 14 days and was amazed at how often my blood sugar dropped below 4 there was no comment on this in my results the results arrived promptly and i found the initial process very efficient however i was really disappointed in the results report it was not individualised and felt like very generic advice that you get across any diet reduce processed food increase natural plant based products reduce eating window i find the 30 plant based varieties over the week very hard to do even though i eat lots of salads and vegetables it is still not enough adding seeds and fruits helps but then i am eating way more calories than i normally would hence in the first three weeks i have gained weight and not lost any i have also found myself with tummy aches and loose stools frequently from all the plant based foodsi have been working on it for a couple of weeks now and just find the app and food scoring frustrating and complicated you can not work it out without the app so are tied into paying the subscription for ever and need your phone with you everywhere you go if eating out i cant see how that is not a marketing con really surely a group of people who have dedicated their work to improving peoples health and learning should have designed a system that the average person can work out and sustain it without continued costs from needing to use the appthe lessons in the app are great if you are new to dieting and nutrition advice they are explained well and set out in bitesize chunks but as someone who has invested over and over again in the latest weight management programme i didnt find any of the lessons contained anything new for me same advice as is available on any decent google search i feel like this was really a waste of money and just another diet industry abuse of a desperate person looking for the answer to their weight problemi signed up for 12 months as was committed to working with this for long term but 3 weeks in and i feel frustrated disappointed and let down i am keen to cancel but cant even see in the app how to do that and from the reviews i see that most people say they dont get any money back anyway i dont know if i can cancel the subscription per month but my next steps is to try
Label: Negative

review_text: zoe has very slick advertising but sadly my customer experience was poor its an expensive programme and for 300 i was expecting a much more personalised service their presentation of information is so incredibly patronising it makes me wonder who its actually aimed at plus theres nothing there that you couldnt get for free from their podcasts or other sources as the science such as it is appears to be publicly available i think the fact that theyve asked me to review their business before i have even had a chance to see my testing results is not a good sign and so far i think its fair to say that it has hindered my dietary progression as much as its helped specifically by having me do a bunch of dietary challenges which are easily achieved if you have access to a greengrocer and the cash to spare
Label: Negative

review_text: firstly i have to say tgat 6 weeks in i have loved every part of the process  from testing results and analysis to dietary advice recipes articles etc all my online chats have been very supportive and positive that was until i realised id been charged 29999 fir the testing kit and then another 299 for my annual membership i have queried this i obviously somehow missed that there would be 2 charges incurred but the original system seems bizarre  you cant have the testing without purchasing a membership package and the membership makes little sense without the testing so why price them separately only once you have joined do you receive any confirmation of the 2 fees but i didnt pickup on that and i was already committed ive found the responses fairly abrupt  basically youve seen the tcs so tough i have gneen offered a reduced membership ie one month or 4 months but although i already have a pretty good diet i feel this requires a longer term commitment to really make a permanent lifestyle change and im already invested so although i have been such a strong advocate of all things zoe this relationship has been tainted the programmes pricing seems deliberately ambiguous not what i expected from tim spector and his team  thoroughly disappointing
Label: Negative

review_text: zoe is groundbreaking concept and whats more from my 1 year experience it works  you have to give it a little time but it works and is easy to stick to once you get in the flowit is not cheap as others have said but you dont have to subscribe for a long period if you dont want to  the program allows you to learn about your personal biology and response to food etc  i have benefited in multiple ways already and have learned a lot that i am carrying forward  i am sufficiently impressed that i have continued subscribing for now as zoe is evolving and tweaking and listeningzoe programme unlike many narrow fad diets is based on broad ranging and solid scientific findings and is not in it to make money as the prime directive the idea is to find a way of improving all our health through proactive easy and mostly tasty adjustments to diet and lifestyle rather than dealing with potentially expensive and unpleasant disease treatments later on  the cost i understand comes from the fact that you are in effect getting individual program tailored to your own biology  in comparison to the cost of a trip to the dentist it really isnt that bad  whats more its findings have been been proven recently through a randomised trial  i believe this is a global first for any diet zoe requires an open and receptive mind set because it differs from the more usual approach  we must take responsibility for our own health not the nhs and i feel that zoe has provided the largest most holistic and effective tool set i have ever encounteredgood bugs are good  zoe will help you support them and help you kick out the bad ones
Label: Positive

review_text: joined the programme last summer and had a gut microbiome score of 83100 excellent my other results werent so good but i was reassured by the gut score zoe contacted me a few days ago to say that my microbiome score had been updated the original score was based upon 15 good and 15 bad bacteria and the new score was based upon newly discovered bacteria now 50 good and 50 bad bacteria i excitedly opened my new results to see that my new score had decreased to 37100 poor consequently have lost much confidence in the whole program they justify this widely divergent result on the basis of scientific advancement however it has made me query the whole concept and especially the point of the original test i feel that i have  been led up the garden path and paid for the privilege wonder if anyone else has had a similar experience

review_text: today was only my second session with my therapist ive seen therapist is the past and didnt hardly talk i felt as if they were being judgemental i love my therapist she listens and understands why i am experiencing the issues i am she has given me homework if you will giving me several different ways to try because everyone is different and the same things do not work for everyone she is very good about explaining what our next session will evolve and how we will work in things learned from the one before she speaks to me in a way i can understand in the past my therapist talked to me as if i were a therapist leaving me more confused than ever i also believe its very important for people to understand that its completely okay to have any number of mental health issues my therapist is great at reminding me that theres many different ways to tackle the issues and if this doesnt work then we will try another way she makes sure i understand that everyone cannot use the same techniques and it befit them i actually enjoy our sessions i look forward to them i have learned a great deal in one 2 session i hope you have the same great experience i am
Label: Positive

review_text: i lost my dog in february she was 14 years old and i had her my entire adult life i was in tears and felt totally out of control and completely overwhelmed i had just moved out of state and had no clue how i was going to get help i did an online search and found cerebral within an hour i was on the phone with a very caring prescriber ladoris bowers she worked with me through my uncontrollable crying and helped me get medication to calm down my care counselor breanna could not have been better she is so sweet and understanding as a few months went by i am now continuing to use cerebral to work on some very necessary trauma i need to heal from and until now was not ready i think with cerebral i can finally open up and continue to work on my mental health would 1010 recommend
Label: Positive

review_text: i absolutely love this app and feel that it is the missing link that helps me take control of my healthi have learned so much based on how i personally respond to different foods i have always tried to eat really healthily but i was unaware that i have a poor blood sugar response wearing the cgm started to alert me to this and then my results confirmed it my healthy diet during the testing period turned out to be 52 in the 4 weeks since then ive moved that first into the 60s and now the mid 70s along the way ive reckmmitted to intermittent fasting and while it hasnt been the key goal ive lost about 7lbs in weight

review_text: update i have to update my review because in the two short weeks since my original review so much has changed first i had the same issue again but this time a new person messaged me and they were completely condescending she didnt look up any of my history or even seem to look at my prescription if she had fact checked she would have known that was she was saying to me was completely false they also charged me for this rx for the first time ever without informing mealso i started a new prescription and wasnt informed of the copay before they sent me the med weeks late i might add since they forgot about it it was 55 i was checking my bank account and saw the charge i tried contacting customer service and they basically said tough luck not our problem apparently customer service also cant answer more than one question at a time because every time i get a reply its only answering one thing i asked about and i have to keep asking the same question over and over againi am ending my service as of now and will be recommending all of my friends that have signed up because of me do the same im absolutely horrified at the lack of care from medical professionals youre supposed to have gone into this field because you want to help people do no harm original review i cant give a full 5 stars because i have had a couple of issues with my rx not shipping when it should due to miscommunication but whenever i bring it to their attention they fix it immediately and do whatever it takes to make sure i get my rx in time

review_text: i have only been with cerebral for 6 months but am on my third provider due to the first 2 leaving with no warning it was frustrating at first to be shuffled around so often and even left without my meds for a week because there was no provider available to authorize a refill i am now satisfied with my current provider i feel like the actually analyzed and discovered the root cause of my anxiety being related to undiagnosed and untreated adhd i have been doing much better with the regime she has prescribed me i love my care counselor she is so bright bubbly and personable i feel that she truly listens to me because she always starts our session by recapping the last and recalls a lot of details the care team is always responsive whenever i have questions and helpful when i am having issues with scheduling

review_text: i dont have traditional insurance to cover mental health matters and wanted to try a specific medication to see if it would help my anxiety and ptsd symptoms after having adverse side effects to ssris in the past however i couldnt find an online service that prescribed that particular medication and didnt know how id get to a doctor during the pandemic and out of pocket i saw an instagram ad for alpha one day and i am usually very wary of sponsored ads particularly when this type of service seems to be springing up everywhere and its hard to know which ones are reputable  but something made me click on that one and i found they offered it as an option and decided to take the plunge the screening i took and results afterward felt very authentic to what id already learned in therapy was going on with me and within a few days i was starting on the medication id wanted to try complete with a bobs burgers gif in my tracking email which told me this company was going to do me right its so helpful  nowadays more than ever  to be able to shoot over a question if i have one and get a fast reply get regular followup screenings to make sure its going well and just walk to my mailbox to get my prescription i was initially a little concerned about getting prescriptions without ever speaking to a person but really the whole process couldnt be easier and i dont feel anythings being taken too lightly very grateful i found this service to help me further address my mental health needs affordably and easily thank you
Label: Positive

review_text: to start i should say that i love the idea of zoe i signed up after all but its just too basic and slowwe live in a world where we can download an app integrate with other apps get regular updates have regular communication videos posts groups etc we live in a world where we can order a blood test from somewhere like medichecks and get detailed results in around 48 hours likewise with lifesupplywhy then does zoe take 3 weeksthe app is so simple  basically its a document repository with a few quiz questions but the information is so basic laughably sotheres no functionality to sync the zoe app to any others like strava so you can see the impact on blood sugar of exercisingeven the blood sugar monitor isnt integrated into zoe  it requires a separate app nothing is joined upbeware signing up for too long dont sign up for anything more than the minimum if you still feel lucky and decide to go ahead because no matter what you do or say what complaints you have they will not allow you to cancel early they are only interested in your subscription moneyyou cannot talk to anyone either their customer service feels like ai bots rather than peoplei would recommend not signing up with zoe

review_text: i have been with headway for the past year and a half and it has been a complete godsend for my practice  the rates they negotiated are 2 12 times more than the hourly rate i was making and that coupled a marketing service like zocdoc allowed me to completely fill up my private practice in 1 month  the clients schedule themselves through the app and billing is completely effortless and seamless  i am able to bill for all my patients for the day in about 3 minutes  patients are able to register in the headway system in about 5 minutes and get email reminders the day before their appointment  the only improvement that i have for headway would be to find a way to bill for all the states that i am licensed in as opposed to just one state  it is both an incredible win for clinicians in terms of pay and taking care of all the administration as well as making healthcare much more accessible to patients as prior to headway i did not accept insurance in my practice as it was too onerous
Label: Positive

review_text: i struggled for years to find help with my adhd and help for my daughter with her depression i found cerebral after i had been off of my medications for almost 5 years due to the inability to find someone who would prescribe to me after moving to a new state cerebral tested me again and then put me in touch with a prescriber and counselor i felt like i was slowly gaining my life back except  i still struggled to find someone who could correctly diagnose my daughter and help her one day my cerebral counselor said to me it sounds like your daughter has severe adhd as well you should have her tested she was tested and also was diagnosed with severe adhd she has been working with cerebral for the last few months and she is a totally different person now ive never seen her so happy or confident our prescriber is amazing and is so understanding and helpful we love our counselor and care counselors this program has been the best experience ever i cant say enough about the program and the people involved i would recommend anyone to cerebral for any mental health condition this program has literally changed my life forever thank you cerebral team
Label: Positive

review_text: i canceled my app 15min after purchasing it  i emailed them for a refund  explained why i needed to cancel  major reason was tight on funds at this time with ny husbands cancer 2 my knee replacement im trying to rush my healing process and my dr said nothing besides pt  walking they emailed me back i believe it was a free week trial or 3 days either way they told me thank you for being truthful and you can enjoy the app for the month you purchased ive never had any app or even orders if they werent shipped even food store deliverys you can cancel with a full refund  this company who owns this app are awful so i recommend finding another wall pilates app  forget this company  i can just imagine there billing process especially if they need my 36 so bad when i explained i cant even use it 15min and they sent a shady were sorry about your situation yet not refund me and clearly explained why then tell me to enjoy it for the month i paid for yeah there sorry crap company  update im extremely impressed how amazing betterme company replied to my complaint they did refund me in full for my mistake im trying to recover from surgery too quickly  thought this app was one of the best out there to purchase my 6 gfs use this app  were all used to being in shape so my extra lbs didnt help my mental state from not working out   however as soon as i get the go ahead from my knee surgeon i will be joining this app asap its a  star app sometimes i jump too soon to make assumptions without a second follow up with the company  if anyone is looking for a great app for keeping in shape without leaving your jobs i recommend this app 200  check out the mental health app they have too its really helpful and it can help anyone again in privacythanks again betterme for your understanding  refund

review_text: my time was short with cerebral due to several factors first off like so many others they do not accept any insurance that is state issued so the first month is usually not to bad as they constantly run sales kinda like the big chain furniture store that runs sales on every holiday  but look out after those 30 days are up depending on the plan you choose it can cost close to 40000 not including your meds if you are prescribed any the people that i dealt with from the 1st assessment  interviewer to the dr assigned aka my provider and my therapist was very nice the only problem that i had was that i had been under care for over 15  years lost dr due to loss of insurance but i had already done the trial of so many medications that did not work for me i did not want to start that all over again its a waste of my time their time not to mention  and no progress or relief for me i know what meds worked for me after many years of trial  error  and could prove it i was willing to sign consent to medical records but was told they have to start out with specific meds 1st before going to the others couldnt give an actual length of time but definitely 90 days or more i couldnt deal with another day let alone 90 and no guarantee that i would get them i found a local place that took my insurance for low income have the same benefits  as cerebral offers plus i  actually get the meds i needed without starting all over my advice check around make some calls before jumping into this unless you just have a free pot of  laying around
Label: Neutral

review_text: if i could give cerebral 0 stars i would my entire experience with them has been atrocious first they will advertise that they have hundreds of therapists in network for you to choose from and that they will match your preferences such as gender religious affiliation age etc after providing my insurance information which is a major insurance network accepted in most medical settings i was told that there were only two options to choose from and neither of them met any of my preference requests the first therapist i met with ended up cancelling my appointments with little to no notice several weeks in a row and the second therapist would assign a specific daytime and if that didnt work for you then youre sol there was no option to request a different daytime than the one he assigned i wish i could say that being prescribed medication was a better experience but unfortunately it was not i was assured that refills would occur automatically that i would not have to constantly remind them to call it in this was not the case and i frequently ran out of my meds because they would not respond to my request for several days on more than one occasion they would switch who my prescriber was with no notice and i would then have to wait several weeks to see them before they would refill my meds leaving me without medication in the meantime when i expressed concerns about how frustrating it was to be without the medication i needed to live a normal life i was met with nothing but nonchalance and dismissive messages basically stating were sorry you feel that way this company does not care about the mental health or wellbeing of their patients and should be avoided at all costs
Label: Negative

review_text: i had such high hopes of the zoe program and joined  in order to gain knowledge of how to achieve optimum nutrition as a regular listener of the podcast i strongly believe in the science behind itmy kit arrived and i went through what felt like quite a short testing period with no end of problems with the glucose monitor although my data was secure and i received my results as planned i understand that this was not the fault of the team at zoe but it really did affect my confidence although i was provided with one free months support to make up for it anyway i was beginning to get into the swing of things when access to my app ceased without notice i admit that i asked for time to consider how long i wanted support for due to an unforeseen expense my dog became very ill and i suddenly had to find thousands of pounds but when i reached out to the support team i was provided with mixed messages with an average several days response time it was misleading as to how long my membership was going to last hence total surprise when i was suddenly unable to log in any moreprior to this i also found that payments were taken by zoe which i was not expecting to incur and i didnt feel it was clear from the outset precisely how much the program costs there was an initial payment is for the kitspread out if required a further payment for the results and a further charge for the ongoing support the main points i want to raise are1 generally i personally feel that 2 weeks is insufficient time to complete an adequate amount of glucose challenges 2 the total cost of being part of the program was far more more than i believe is made clear3 it would be more affordable to be able to spread payments month my month rather than suddenly find another 299 charged to your account4 i am disappointed not to be part of the zoe program any more but generally feel the support team are understaffed and this may be in part why i am unsure about continuing 5 i now feel unsure as to exactly how much benefit i gained from being part of the program especially after spending around 600 over such a short amount of  time
Label: Neutral

review_text: i dont know what word to use to describe the signup process for this company but predatory comes to mind i began the signup process and before getting to the point that i was selecting therapists or treatment options i decided i wasnt going to go forward with their service trouble is though i had already given them my billing info and although i hadnt selected any specific service and certainly was not receiving any service i discovered months after closing out of the signup that i was being billed 86 a month after reaching out both by email and on their site ive gotten only an autoreply from the company telling me to read their faq there is no option to close my account or cancel payments when i log in on either my pc or the app and it seems like my only solution may be to continue the signup by giving them more sensitive information about myself and hope that im given those options once its complete its really remarkable to me after this experience that people are trusting this company to help them improve their mental health
Label: Negative

review_text: i started using cerebral about 2 years ago  i switched to cerebral because i got tired of having to travel 30 minutes to my psychiatrists office paying an expensive copay and spending a lot of money on prescriptions every month  cerebral has many different providers  counselors to choose from so you can find the right fit for you  find appointment times that are convenient  ive had a great experience with my providerscounselorsyou just video chat they send you exercises to help with depressionanxiety that you can do when you feel like and they send your prescriptions through the mail every month  i pay about 75 a month and that is an awesome price for all the help you get  thats cheaper than most copays at a drs officenot to mention the price if your insurance doesnt cover it  i have bipolar disorder  generalized anxiety disorder  cerebral has helped me get my life back
Label: Positive

review_text: pros i enjoyed watching my blood sugar sensor and seeing the effects of food on my blood sugar cons gained weight to be able to provide a detailed review i have wrote my experience against zoe claims reach healthy weight  i have gained 3kg and 4cm around my waist in the first 4 weeks of using the app improve energy levels  i have not felt a change in energy i still have the mid afternoon slump less hunger  i have felt less hungry however this is most likely due to eating more calories hence the weight gain to get a higher score you need to add high scoring foods such as vegetables nuts seeds avocado etcfeel less bloated  i wasnt overly bloated before to be able to see a difference sleep better  unable to comment as i have always slept well overall i think the programme is probably good for people who do not have any understanding of nutrition however i already planned and prepped meals which would score over 70 for each meal and it is the quantity of the ingredient which need to be controllezoe does not promote

review_text: ive had adhd for as long as i can remember my parents took me off of medication in about seventh grade as i got older life just got more difficult my adhd and anxiety was not something that i spoke about very often and honestly was embarrassed finally at 46 years old with the help of emily and kimberly i am doing better than i ever have i think the hardest struggle for me was trying to stay successful in the hospitality industry on my own without mental help and with my anxiety at its high and adhd taking over my life completely yet somehow i managed to function enough to make it where i am today at least until i hit that rock and a hard place and knew i needed to reach out for help cerebral made it easy for me i feel comfortable i feel validated and its nice to have people who understand and relate nothing changes in a day but i am a better version of myself today than i was four months ago because of emily and kimberly

review_text: after 34 years of mishandling my life and issues i finally reached out for help because i was truly concerned for my future i did research and found a few similar companies but i liked the therapist network with cerebral so i tried it out and was even able to pick my therapist based off my needs and personal background i found sally davis now my life has been very hard and telling people about it normally makes them cry and wonder how im still alive today i was having daily mental breakdowns crying daily i had zero hope in a future for myself had attempted suicide multiple times before felt i didnt matter felt abandoned and just felt like if i passed today it wouldnt be so bad for me a therapist was my last attempt being able to live and be happy and sally did not disappoint while i have a ways to go i can tell you i finally had a breakthrough and for the first time in 34 years i have true hope for my future this lady is a hero not just because of her career profession but its what she puts into it that makes the difference secondly i had a time sensitive urgent issue and i got in contact with sabrina from customer service you know how some customer service agents do nothing but stick to a script and never follow up not sabrina not only did she see a tricky situation but she thought outside of the box and did everything she possibly could just to help she then called back quickly to discuss what she did and how to go about things may not seem like much but from someone who works i customer service i can say people like her are what makes a company works and what helps keep people there if you are on the fence about therapy and need help please give cerebral a try i was also not sure but im so glad i signed up and tried this
Label: Positive

review_text: ive been using cerebral for a few months lost my union job in august i get all my prescriptions without insurance my welbutrin is 10 bucks a bottle so was my hydroxyzine they send any other scripts to a pharmacy and i use goodrx to purchase them my care counselor brittany mullan is like the perfect fit for me she can actually have a conversation about all my weird tendencies lifestyle and even helped me set up goals and messages me to see where im at its really helping me get back on the ball with gaining income and getting back into a life flow my provider justin cortez is straightforward without being condescending like every other male provider ive worked with he speaks directly normally i feel like i have to hide things or just keep trying med combos versus asking what else i can do tbh even when i do gain employment with health insurance im keeping cerebral in case anyone wants a real review  im happy this is here for me they even gave me q grace period because i do not have a job and am scrambling for income ive already paid on time for a few months im just out of income at the moment

review_text: very expensive for a poo test  the 14day measurement device packed up after 8 days just as i was about to test in exercise environments and no replacement allowed so no useful data therethen you have to pay 3750 a month for several months more to retestmost disliked feature was that the information comes in very long chatty podcasts which i dont have time for  why can we not just read a factual account

review_text: i mainly embarked on the zoe journey as i had had a lot of dietary issues in the past and wanted to see how my microbiome was doing i already had a good idea of food nutrition and ate a healthy diet so i wasnt expecting to learn anything new how wrong was i  the learning process has been the biggest game changer for me in particular understanding my body reaction to saturated fats and how i can improve this through simple changes the combination of foods is fascinating and the scoring system so helpful and motivating i particularly like scanning foods as i shop to find the best options and i can imagine this will takeover from reading tiny labels on food in the near future  in fact this is the preventative treatment that the nhs should be investing in for the future health of all of us i am into my third month now and im logging all of my meals every day which at first seemed a big deal but ive now got used to it i plan to complete 4 months and then likely stop the membership as by then the new habits i have formed will have become normality for me the only reason for the 4 stars and not 5 is that in the beginning had a few issues for me  the cookies in the test were so sweet and dense i literally couldnt eat them all so this may have affected my results also the first week was quite overwhelming with the information coming through and as a result i didnt complete the tasks correctly so leave yourself plenty of time to get going yes its expensive but its the best thing ive invested in for my future health and as others have said the response from the chat is really helpful thanks zoe
Label: Positive

review_text: i give it two stars because of the counselor she help to not make it one everything else is awful when you are dealing with people with issues like this it needs to be more thorough i know my body more than someone i spoke to on the phone for five minutes i am not saying you should ever give out anxiety meds like candybut when someone needs only a few to last for a month or sothen it obviously isnt for abuse purposes i went with the option and it did not help i cancelled it awhile ago on top of that i joined with the pretense of 1 a day to help your mental health after the first 30it was going to be 82 a month then with a discount it was 5950 a month less meds there is not 60 days in a month last week i asked to not get the meds sent to me i wanted to speak with someone first the next thing you know im getting an email about meds being sent i didnt want that then another email about me not having money for it i am happy i didnt have money in that account because i did not want those meds i told them this on june 1st on top of it i couldnt schedule my next counseling session until august 9th so i cant get counseling or the right meds and i am paying for it no thanks this has been more anxiety then helping

review_text: the best thing about zoe was having the tests especially the continuous glucose monitor to have some data on how ones body processes foodi also think it is great for someone who has no or limited knowledge about nutrition eg doesnt know the difference between a doughnut and a green chicken salad andor is looking to lose weight in my experience beyond the test phase it doesnt add value if you have a  decent enough knowledge about food are not looking to lose weight or to form better eating habits  because yours are already good  my attempts to get nuanced advice from the advisers did not get anywhere  i was not ever sure if i was speaking to an agent or a nutritionist such was the nature of the advice  none of them seemed to take on board that i had an excellent gut biome and diet  and was trying to eat better to manage poor fat and sugar responses both of which were hereditary my particular equation isnt one that zoe is designed to help and i would have liked zoe to have said so instead i was dragged along by them until i cancelled update ive noted the two responses from zoe to my review ive already spent enough time and energy trying to get actionable useful guidance  an example is zoes insistence that i should focus on my daily score whereas i was clear that i wanted to flatten my sugar curve as much as possible i noticed that zoe scoring was telling me that there were foods i could enjoy freely such as courgetteartichoke and yet the more granular details on these foods obtained by clicking again showed that both these were bad for my blood sugar  to me this meant that they should not be categorised as enjoy freely zoe advisers disagreed

review_text: jai rcemment eu une exprience trs frustrante avec liven aprs une priode dessai je me suis retrouv abonn avec un renouvellement automatique trs difficile  annuler lorsque jai voulu annuler labonnement via leur site web je me suis heurt  un soit disant problme technique qui rendait la dmarche impossible liven affirme fournir des instructions claires et un service fiable mais en ralit leur systme empche une dsinscription claire et facilede plus malgr mes tentatives de rsolution du problme liven a refus de rembourser les frais prlevs 7499  invoquant leur politique de remboursement mme si les charges ont t appliques sans mon consentement explicite leur service client a t peu coopratif et je me sens contraint de partager mon exprience pour avertir les autres consommateurs de ces pratiques quasi frauduleuses soyez trs prudents avec liven et surveillez de prs vos abonnementsenglishi recently had a very frustrating experience with liven after a trial period i found myself subscribed with an automatic renewal that was incredibly difficult to cancel when i attempted to cancel the subscription through their website i encountered a technical issue that made it impossible liven claims to provide clear instructions and reliable service but in reality their system prevents a clear and easy unsubscriptionfurthermore despite my attempts to resolve the issue liven refused to refund the charges citing their refund policy even though the charges were applied without my explicit consent as you cannot unsubscribe easily their customer service was uncooperative and i feel compelled to share my experience to warn other consumers of these nearly fraudulent practices be very cautious with liven and closely monitor your subscriptions

review_text: i hate diets i have always said that that fastest way to put on weight is to go on a diet so when i heard that zoe was more about food choices based on personalised nutrition with nothing being disallowed i was curious i had to take a deep breath before spending the money on zoe im so glad i did i view it as investing in my future i always thought i had a reasonably healthy diet however the assessment highlighted areas of my diet that caused great stress to my body it was an eye opener and since following the diet recommendations i feel much healthier and have more energy i would whole heartedly recommend this process

review_text: ive had such a positive experience with zoe i find the app easy to use and the volume of factual expert information and advice on the app is unlike any other information site about food nutrition and health and habits that ive seen  so relevant and constantly updating i have had such a positive experience from my online coach hannah d her kindness and understanding are making the lifestyle changes i am making so much easier she is so positive and non judgemental  not only in her style of engagement but i feel she has such a breadth of knowledge in this field like im in safe hands there will be people who use the zoe app that will only need to make small changes and update some food choices but for me the personalised results of the testing have highlighted that i needed to make a real change in my mindset about food which i am being able to do supported by hannah d and the zoe app
Label: Positive

review_text: when i first signed up for alpha i was under the impression that my medication would come in the mail every month at a specified date this is actually what happened for the first few months but then for some reason around the fourth or fifth month i would have to remind alpha to send my medication this normally happened when i was running low on my current dose of venlafaxine effexor and realized that the new months supply might not make it to me on timea couple of weeks ago i ran into the same situation i was running low on my current prescription of venalfaxine and when the new months supply hadnt come in the mail yet i messaged alpha a few of days before my then current supply ran out after two or three days of waiting they responded and said that they were sending out my new prescription but it was too late it did not arrive before i ran out of my venlafaxine pills for the monthsince this is one of the hardest antidepressants to come off of in terms of side effects the withdrawal i felt during the two days when i didnt have my medication was brutal crazy brain zaps intense vertigo insane mood swingsi could barely function i couldnt work i felt miserable eventually my new month supply made it to me but the pain i felt while it wasnt there was terrible alpha should have mailed me my prescription in a timely manner but they failed to do so theyre unreliable and unstable
Label: Negative

review_text: i personally wouldnt recommend zoe it is really expensive and doesnt offer value for money if you are wanting to get personalised information on your health and wellbeing i would check what else is out there before committing to a subscription i chose zoe because i wanted get a handle on my health and gain an insight into how my environment affects me and my body as a young person who has been unfortunate enough to have suffered from various underlying health conditions over the years i was excited to gain insight into factors which could improve my health unfortunately zoe wasnt the plan for me dont rush into trying something make sure you do what is right for you and your body updated 05 june 2024 i thank zoe for their correspondence with me on my review i did make zoe aware that i was unable to continue with the service on the advice of my doctor unfortunately my underlying health conditions have meant that i was unable to proceed with the programme i put to zoe that their interest lies in their profit over the care of their customers  to which they gave the following responseplease know that our focus remains on our customers and we are continually working to balance this with the sustainability of our businessit would appear to me that zoe has drawn that line in the wrong place and that their desire to make money surpasses the care they have for their customers particularly those who end up being unable to participate in the programme or to even complete the testing who will be liable to pay hefty fees if you do consider choosing zoe and do take on a subscription be mindful of those implications their terms and conditions state in exceptional circumstances for example if you submit an order but are then told by your physician that you should not participate zoe may in its absolute discretion refund some or all of the fees you have paidzoe does not apply this discretion lightly and chose not to apply it in my case not only had i paid 200 but am told i need to pay the remaining 100 if youre unfortunate enough to have underlying health conditions zoe will make you pay every penny despite being unable to utilise the testing or service please be mindful
Label: Negative

review_text: i have only had two sessions with my clinician so far but i already feel i can trust my therapist kelly walsh she has offered excellent and evidence based strategies for me to try she has also reminded me about grounding techniques which are great for selfcentering and selfsoothing which is helpful for my anxiety and ptsd she was honest about her skill set and her professional standing cerebral is a safe place to go to talk to someone and learn how to move forward from past traumas scheduling is easy and they provide an array of therapists to choose from  i chose my therapist based on her skill set dbt which can be hard to find
Label: Positive

review_text: in a world where we are short medical professionals i am so incredibly grateful to have alpha here for the public when we need them  especially for things we cant get otc  their online service was seriously one of the best experiences i had dealing with medical appointments  i understand our medical professionals are inundated and overwhelmed  that is why its absolutely necessary to have this option available to us  i was turned away by my endocrinologist stating thats not my area go see your pcp problem is my pcps keep quitting and i get shuffled around  no continuity  hard to get in  i was told to go to urgent care or the er for a very minor issue  therefore i will keep coming to alpha  thank you
Label: Positive

review_text: as a qualified nurse struggling to lose weight i was convinced that the reason was because of my gut microbiome all my tests came back good and above which doesnt fall in line with a lot of the promotional talk that i watched from zoes peoplegreat motivator to think about eating whole foods however its common sense that ultra processed food is bad for us very disappointed to see an automatic renewal has charged my card another 4 months payment today which i cant affordwhen i signed up it was for the tests plus 4 months the auto renewal must be hidden somewhere in the small print feel conned to be honest i know as a healthcare professional that all i needed was 4 months to learn whats good for my body also i have no access to my phone while im at work for 1213 hour shifts 3 days in a row and its just not practical to play catch up save your money eat whole foods cut back on processed food and exercise 30 minutes a day update  i got a refund on the automatic subscription

review_text: i signed up for zoe testing last november the report you get back is so thorough and an eye opener i am plant based and have been for many years vegetarian before that but i had started to slip into having vegan convenience food in the freezer which after a day at work and a hungry monkey on my shoulder lead to me being very lazy and eating far too much highly processed foods zoe gave me a massive list of foods that are good for my blood sugar blood fats and gut nothing is off menu the aim is to regularly score high and zoe shows you how to food combine to achieve this i regularly score 70 i continue to use the app and record my meals everyday i look forward to the sunday improve report which shows how you have done during the week i know my metabolism has been shot over the years by me doing stupid diets taking pills and potions that promise me all sorts of miracles with zoe this has all been about health improving my gut biome has improved my general well being  ibs symptoms have disappeared i feel more energetic i meal prep every weekend so i know i have great food waiting for me when i get home and if that monkey is screaming at me the the almond and peanut butter cookies that dont spike my blood sugars are on standby i love using zoe im hoping my metabolism will eventually repair and maybe i will start to lose a few pounds if you looking for a quick fix diet then zoe may not be for you and you will think its expensive if you want to change your mindset of the way and the food you eat want to be educated and go forward with an improved general health then zoe is worth the investment  support is great the podcasts are so informative i give zoe a massive 5 out of 5
Label: Positive

review_text: alpha medical was very easy to deal with i had a consultation and ordered medication quickly and straightforwardly the medication arrived in the mail just a couple of short days after i placed the order the whole process was simple and positive
Label: Positive

review_text: i was looking for a new provider for my pills and chose this company because of prices and reviews  i was happy with the process and ordered a 3 month supply  that was a week ago when i still had about a week and a half to go on my current regiment  after my order was completed i got an email saying i should expect a shipping confirmation within 24 hours and expect my pills between 35 business days  4 days later i emailed them to ask where my shipping confirmation was  i was then sent a tracking number that had been issued that day 4 days after order and that the usps was still waiting for the package  its now over 3 days after the post office generated that tracking number and it still says shipping label created usps awaiting itemi didnt even mention that that pharmacy they decided to go with is in california and im in florida  the post office doesnt even have my pills yet and im 45 shipping days away  theres no way ill get my pills on time for me to start my next cycle let alone within 35 business days  ill be lucky to get them by this time next week when i emailed them today instead of valid customer service and solutions their respose was the pharmacy had a delay because of a power outage unless that power outage was a week long in which case they should have instantly gone with another pharmacy for their customers sakes this is at best a weak excuse for incompetence  i will not use this service again and i urge anyone who needs something in a timely manner to avoid them too
Label: Neutral

review_text: i started my journey in february and have logged almost every meal  the app can be a little frustrating at times when you cant find an item or zoe dont score it yet but on the whole it works very well  i thought i had a pretty good diet before i started zoe but following the zoe guidelines ive improved my gut health enormously  i have lost weight without trying and i dont feel hungry during the day eating in a more conscious way love zoe and plan to continue with the app for another year or so

review_text: i went to cerebral after being let down a multitude of times by mental health professionals in my adhd concerns ive been judged stigmatized wait listed and actually abandoned in the middle of being treated after being prescribed non stimulation 3rd line antidepressant that could help with adhd symptoms medication that wasnt good for me got so bad i had to stop on my own after weeks of trying to reach out and no responseall this during a global pandemic where health care professionals were already overwhelmed i couldnt have chose a better time to get checked for adhd sarcasmi came across cerebral and decided to give it a shot the badi wont lie due to my own lack of knowledge and adovcating for myself i stayed with my first presciber longer than i should of  my first presciber while extremely nice was too passive and seemed to really lean toward one medication that stopped working and was making feel really badregardless of if i expressed trying something else it would end up with me seeing how i feel or another dose increase they seemed to be afraid of prescribing stimulants i can understand why with the stigma around it and it being a controll substance that is commonly abused unfortunately that fear didnt do much to help me and made me feel worse each time i took it so i stopped taking the medication and reached out to my team as a final try i expressed my concernsadvocated for myself and was paired with a new prescriberthe good my new prescriber listened to my needs asked me deeper questions and isnt as passive when it comes to my treatment they even check in on me outside of the video appointment now for my care counselor im absolutely in love my care counselor is so so amazing and i feel like ive made strides with her since starting she holds me accountable teaches me new skills i can actually use and has been the most help ive ever had while talking to someone as a mental health professionaltherapist like if i could just see her id be happy ill be so sad if she were to ever leave cerebral honestly if she does i think id go too because shes the only reason thats worth staying on for overall my experience with cerebral started off rocky and bitter sweet with a great care counselor and a questionable prescriber after the switch it really balanced itself out and i couldnt be happier though i do have one annoyance is the constant switching of coordinators ive probably had about 45 since starting id like to have one thats consistent another thing id like to have is reviews for the care counselor  i have yet to have been able to write one for mine and i would like to give her praise for what she does individually i was beginning to get apprehensive about cerebral due to some bad reviews but im thinking now its definitely depends on location and the resource of doctors nps psychiatrist  etc they have for each area
Label: Neutral

review_text: im being continually contacted and have been asked today to update my review because the belief is theyve done a great job in resolving my complainti was charged for a subscription i didnt know i had signed up tobefore being charged there was no email or notification to let me know the subscription was about the renew the amount and which card the payment would be taken fromi have repeatedly asked for the order where i agreed to a subscription with the terms and conditions  i have also asked where on their website i can see my subscription read the terms and have sight of the payments dueno surprise  none of the above has been provided because it doesnt existi made a comprehensive review which clearly stated id received a refund i went via my bank and raised a dispute  the response on here was automated and showed they hadnt read my review  ive since been contacted a further four times asking if they can help resolve my issue  at this point i can only assume hypnozio has no management or structure with complaints going into a pot and there being no system or process for managing and documenting theman absolute shambles of a companyi can see theyve suddenly had a wave of positve reviews which is highly suspicious given just a few weeks ago the entire page was unhappy customersdo not use this company is my final review as requested by the head of customer carehypnozio  stop emailing me
Label: Neutral

review_text: been using this app since november of 2022 and can honestly say it is easily the best thing ive ever done in life  its helped make my medicalhealth decisions incredibly easy without the hassle of having to make an appointment at your doctor avoiding the wait times to get that appt and to be seen  i would highly recommend this app to everyone im so so so incredibly grateful for their professional and friendly service

review_text: i have just completed 4 months of the zoe program and i am now renewing again for the first time in my life i have finally got to understand how my body works what i need and what i dont want to have entering my body in particular i have stopped eating processed foods whilst at home i think far more about what i am preparing and cooking and although i know it is not a weightloss programme i have lost 8 kgs i love the recipes although hard for one person at times so i do have to freeze or eat the same dish  the next day i really enjoy the podcasts and they are generally my morning listenings my only worry is that i lead a pretty good social life that means i eat and drink out a fair bit or at friends homes where i can i try to be careful but am not beating myself up over this feeling guilty or losing friends i do what i can and certainly feel so much better than i did before starting zoe it is expensive for a pensioner  but hopefully the longterm benefits will show
Label: Positive

review_text: so far my experience has been great any infrequent glitches with the app get solved quickly enough the conversations do close quickly but reopening them gets results the science behind this is very informative and i love the fact that it is so personalised ive learnt a lot about my body responses to food some of which are surprising but the fact that i can do something about it and being shown how is a godsend it would be good if all the recipes used either cups or grams or handfuls rather than mix and match im constantly having to google amounts and temps on the oven as i have gas  i love the lessons and podcasts and the weekly review of how im doing also the odd reminder see how to improve my meals regarding in my case fibre intake its like having a personal nutritionist by your side wish it had been around years ago
Label: Positive

review_text: ive been reading about nutrition for several years including books by tim spector  trying to find solution to my weight problem i was happy to join zoe last july i now know that i process blood sugar and fat in my blood poorly this alone was worth it because its what i suspected the programme provides me with masses of info access to a nutrition coach  recipes and a series of lessons  and a logging system which im familiar with as a veteran user of noom and my fitness palive also used intermittent fasting which reduced the pain in my arthritic knees  i really feel im part of a whole new way of understanding health led by zoe
Label: Positive

review_text: ive loved doing the zoe programme thought i had a healthy diet but finding out that both my glucose metabolism and fat metabolism were badpoor has been really helpful zoe teaches how to combine foods to mitigate glucose spikes and helps with adjusting recipes to make them healthier increasing fibre and protein in my daily meals has meant i have fewer carbs and am not hungry husband very happy with our change in diet  more beans and salads  and i dont think well ever look back lost 10kg weight without really trying and its staying off ive been a member for a year and sad to see it go but i feel optimistic i can manage on my own now would love the option of a zoe light membership where i could check new foods and recipes but sadly not available
Label: Positive

review_text: good with some caveats the zoe app ai is very good at taking information about foods in various quantities and units and computing nutrition information  saves me a lot of work i also appreciate having the zoe scores for how my meals likely impact my blood sugar fat metabolism and microbiome the zoe staff are friendly and knowledgeable  i appreciate their answers to my question on the other hand this is definitely not a weight  loss program i have can have a  high score every day and still gain weight also  while zoe claims that no foods are offlimits achieving a high score requires eating some foods in such small quantities that they might as well be off limits all in all zoe is very useful  but not the only arrow in my nutrition quiver

review_text: i have struggled with anxiety and depression for the past 15 years of my life i currently live in a small town with limited healthcare options i was advised to seek online help through a local mental health facility  i took the health assessment and signed up for online medication management and care counseling i honestly and openly discussed my illness to my provider and care counselor  my provider immediately started me on medication to manage me depression and anxiety and i was excited to be getting help again however after meeting with my care counselor unbeknownst to me she decided that i was more suitable for in person treatment and sent me a chat to say this  the website is basically unnavigable and i was unable to see this chat i consequently waited for medication that wasnt going to come and was charged an additional month before i reached out to support who informed me of the chat sent by my care counselor  i complained to support and they refunded my money and canceled my subscription  this whole process was extremely frustrating i am merely trying to get help and i cant seem to get it through online or in person methods  if i wasnt a good candidate for treatment cerebral should have mentioned this after my health assessment or my visit with provider at the very least an email shouldve been sent telling me my care counselors opinion instead of a chat which i could not access  by sending me an email i could have sought treatment from another source quicker and may not have gone through with drawls from my medication  and the fact that my care counselor suggested in person treatment during a global pandemic where most doctors offices arent seeing patients was laughable furthermore i should have never been charged in the first place for a service that they were refusing me
Label: Neutral

review_text: update 102224  was told via email that id receive a partial 50 refund two weeks ago andstill has not happened definitely read the fine printjust submitted a contact ticket requesting a refund after seeing an automatic payment from my paypal acct for 66 to uab rebilita aka brainetycom hypnoziocom initial purchase was april six months ago and at that time i was completely unaware that this purchase was a subscriptionwill update this review once i see how this company responds to my refund and cancellation request and how timely the response isfollowup buyer bewaredid get a quick response to my cancellation request whether a legitimate practice or because i also posted on trustpilot my subscription has been cancelled but their policy does not allow refunds according to hypnozio by law sellers and producers of digital content have the right to refuse to make refunds for past periods during which the consumer was able to use the subscription and receive digital content the problem the subscription charge is not for the past six months its for the next six months my subscription now ends on 20250410 which means im paying for future access not past i have not accessed their productprogram for probably 4 months and im sure they are able to track thatan olive leaf was extended in that they are giving a 50 refund will watch for that and update accordingly
Label: Positive

review_text: the first appointment with the prescriber stacey went well  had adhd and really bad insomnia  so she prescribed something interesting that cerebral suggests for bothso i took it for 2 weeks  nada  i went back in to cerebral to see if they could prescribe me something more traditional for insomnia i was thinking ambien xr or seroquelthere was a blurb on seeing your prescriber again if you needed a different medication  their process  sounds goodbut the second time stacey was a brick wall listened to nothing i said and giving standard useless medical advice  maybe this maybe that  as if i am stupid and know nothing about this i am a research biologist by the way i know plenty about insomniahow about a sleep study  had one 15 years ago  wasnt sleep apnea they looked sad and a bunch of useless cognitive behavioral therapy crappola that i told her i had already tried including recently and they are useless for mei again said i want to try a more standard insomnia med  again brick walli used cerebral because i had a brick wall hospital network doctor who prescribed me trazadone which didnt work so he prescribed me more which didnt worki said to stacey i just want to try these for a week  if they dont work they dont work again brick wall stacey  maybe you should try a sleep specialist  i said that would take seven months  what is the damn purpose of cerebral if they dont do what they say they are there for  so much for fast and flexible serviceso what is the point on their website of requesting a different med if the first didnt worki canceled  the sad thing is i was so intrigued by their whole business model  unfortunately they seem to employ some brick walls who are stone deafavoid
Label: Negative

review_text: i went through the programme near the start of the year and overall had an ok experience there were some useful insights and any questions i had were answered fairly promptly through the chat i decided that for me personally the membership wasnt worth it so i stopped after 1 monthcut to a few months later and i request access to my data from the testing at the start of the programme specifically my gut microbiome results and im told i have to rejoin the programme to gain accessthis feels like a massive slap in the face ive turned a lot of people onto their podcast paid a whole lot of money to do their tests even opted to let them use my data for research usually id be the one getting paid for this not the other way around and tried out their programme before deciding its not for me right nownow in return all im asking for is for someone to take 2 seconds to essentially export a pdf and email it to me and theyre asking for me to pay for a whole new membership all of their pricing separates out the monthly cost of the membership from the oneoff cost of the testing so i dont see how me stopping my membership suddenly means you can take back what i paid 300 for so you can try and get me to pay even more moneyi get this is all in their terms and conditions but regardless its left me feeling exploited and i wont be recommending or engaging with anything zoe in the future
Label: Negative

review_text: one month into the zoe programme and i am pleased to say i have found it very beneficial the test results were very interesting luckily for me i have good blood sugar and blood fat responses but i am working to improve my gut microbiome which is poor it would be very helpful if one could get the poop test done again periodically to monitor progress  i like being able to keep tabs on my nutritional intake and adjust my diet accordingly i would definitely recommend doing zoe
