review_text: i have absolutely loved the zoe programme  i found the testing fascinating and despite scoring very well in all areas i have still both lost weight and improved my health by following their methodology  its centred around adding foods in rather than taking them away which is a joy and im actually consuming more calories than i was before  i am in my late 40s but suffering from axial spondyloarthritis and this time last year was in significant pain  i was already eating what i thought was a healthy whole food based and nonupf diet  however the changes i have made via zoe along with intermittent fasting inspired by the zoe podcasts and what tim spector says about it have meant that for the first time in years my condition is improved  my digestion seems to work far better and more consistently than it used to iyswim and i would advocate the programme for anyone  have only given a 4 because the customer team response times can be slow and because its not available on the web yet  there are various user niggles but overall its excellent
Label: Positive

review_text: alpha medical withdrew 470 from my account without my authorization they said that by me completing a consultation im agreeing to medical treatment so i guess that means if i go to my pcp theyre allowed to drain my money from my account and shove medication down my throat nope over the last year they were always very communicative with me and made sure to go over copays and cash payments before charging me i was always given the option to approve or deny before moving forward this time they prescribed me 3 medications that i did not request and would have been clear if they would have looked at my history at 2 am sunday and by the time i woke up in the morning all of my money was gone and the order had been processed after a week of trying to dispute these transactions with them i finally received a partial refund the following morning they charged my account another 125 after someone had already told me all of my future orders have been cancelled the 125 was from an order they could not charge me for because they had already put my bank account in the negative that previous sunday thankfully i received a refund the following week i was a loyal customer and would recommend them to everyone but now i have them blocked from my bank and i no longer plan to continue with alpha medical moving forward because of this i was unable to keep food on the table and missed a car payment

review_text: its early days for me on the zoe plan but so far so good finding out what foods dodont work for my biology is both surprising and a delight some foods i assumed would be ok for me arent and a lot of foods ive historically avoided or kept to minimum i can now eat regularlyfreely and guilt free that said nothing is banned and i usually eat what i want as long as i take care with my meal planning being able to understand my blood sugarfat responses as well as whats going on in my gut biome has been a revelation and i do hope this will one day become the norm for everyone under the nhs it certainly helps me feel more responsible for my health ive signed up for a year believing i need a decent length of time to make the changes i want and for them to become a part of my normal life this has cost me 600 but as someone else has already written i guess it depends on the value you put on your own health and wellbeing that said if you buy a 3 coffee every working day for a year then youll have paid 780 for that  making zoe comparatively cheap i would chosen a 6 month option had that been available but at the time of joining there was a choice of 1 month 4 month or a yearany queries ive had have been answered within given timescales and replies have been very comprehensive for me although weight loss is an important part of this journey becoming more healthy is of paramount importance to me that said a few weeks in and im down just about half a stone and it doesnt feel like ive been trying to lose weight ive even been eating chocolate as part of my eating plan bonusthis plan does require quite a lot of commitment to food planning i was already eating reasonably healthily but im still having to make quite a number of substantial changes to the way i eat logging meals is an important part of measuring this for me and it does take time especially in the beginning when logging recipes and meals for the first time i think it will get easier as time passes though although they say theres no obligation to log meals i fail to see how i would get the best of the plan without doing so at least for the first few months anyway i find the improve section of the app most helpful every week which i wouldnt have if i dont log my meals so for me this a definitely worth the purchase but be aware of the time commitment required in order to get the best out of the app
Label: Positive

review_text: i love zoe  it has exceeded my expectations in every way i have been following the programme logging sometimes other times not for over a year now and weigh the same as i did in my 20s having lost 1 stone in weight i feel great have loads of energy am sleeping well and some random aches and pains have gone personalised nutrition has been easier to follow than i anticipated and what i particularly love about the impact zoe has had is that i feel entirely in tune with my body it also feels very sustainable and now embedded as a way of life in the past i thought i followed a very healthy diet but it didnt take into account the way my body handles glucose or fat eating the zoe way suits me so very well i cant recommend it enough

review_text: i started this experience hoping to lose weight  the usual stuff in the 6 months i have been on the program we have had the death of a parent and friend i have had a major stress and change at work i developed sciaticia and tore a tendon in my knee also a major building project going on at home my husband and i were discussing the zoe experience  we are both  feel  fitter and no longer have hunger pangs the weight may not have left us but we have both coped well with the stresses thrown at us and even if we go off the rails we now know what helps us feel better as whole it has been a very interesting and positive experience for both of us  it has changed our attitude to food and the way we eat it

review_text: im very much someone who does not believe opinion i like to see and feel proof i know from experience that denial does not work long term with food managementwhether you are seeking help manage food intake or just want to change how you feel zoe makes this possiblecould i have kicked my diabetes into submission in 6 months without it possibly but zoe has made it easier given me the reinforcement i needed and helped remind me each day i dont always agree with the scores they give but i dont cheat them im a good cook which helps but their recipes really helptexture is always the biggest issue for me so getting food with bite and crunch and resistance has been difficult but ive done it that and stop eating carbsor at least stop eating simple carbs who knew bread was my nemesis eat well to feel wellit is not easy it is not always satisfying and you need to find your own path through which works for you but they give you the tools to do itit is also not cheap but frankly it is worth every pennyi have reduced my weight by 35 stone my waist line is 6in reduced and my belly more i have energy again i have far less inflammation issues i can think and feel normal again and im enjoying life againi recommend giving this a go to anyone who asksit is working for me
Label: Positive

review_text: this company has poor comunication practices and plays with your mental health while charging you a lot of money if you take benzodiazipines for a long time and need to find a provider go through your insurance  i lost 300 when i signed with cerebral it was cleared that if you could proof that you have been taking lorazepam your provider would be able to prescribe it  my goal with cerebral was to get treatment and tried to get rid of this terrible medication  i have been taking it for 20 years  i was prescribed lorazepam and lexapro  i had to pay 30 for the lorazepam  i was not able to get the lorazepam and my provider was very kind to send the prescription to a local pharmacy with 3 refills  i was grateful and mentally started to think about settings goals to stop this addiction my care coordinator and i were working toward minimizing my symptoms however they knew the company had changed policies regarding prescribing benzos 4 weeks ago and they did not communicate with me and charged me on 9222020 they monthly premium  in august 1 my nephew 22 years old died in a car accident  after the funeral i started taking the lexapro to start my treatment to find a solution to stop taking lorazepam  lexapro made me extremely anxious and couldnt take it  i am stock with lorazepam and today 4 weeks after they knew i get to speak with my provider and learn the sad news that this company cannot help me  please dont think you will get help with your addiction  if they say they will prescribe benzos dont believe it  run away
Label: Negative

review_text: the zoe programme alerted me to some potential health issues due to poor glucose and fat control so it has been great to address this through my diet my original microbiome score was good and i have just got my results back from my retest my score has increased from 66 good to 98 excellent so im delighted the programme keeps introducing new elements which are great  such as being able to get scores by photographing a recipe i write the zoe scores in my recipe books for when i unsubscribe and lose all my data that is the only downside i also lost the weight i wanted in around 3 months and have more or less maintained it
Label: Positive

review_text: i started the zoe health program the week before christmas 2022 out for all those christmas meals with my blood sugar monitor was interesting i always thought i had poor blood sugar control but i didnt i do however have poor fat control my weight fell by 7lbs within the first few weeks and i now manage to keep it stable my ibs is nonexistent and i very rarely have bowel problems ive stayed with the app and continued the membership its a great help knowing of recipes are good or bad for me great to be able to scan foods in the supermarket and know whether its a good buy for me or not i had my second gut health test and my microbiome had improved considerably i still have my off days when i eat rubbish but then i feel a dramatic difference in my body and get straight back on to zoe i think my general health has been better too probably because my own pharmacy is working for me when i consider what i spent on slimming clubs over the years zoe isnt expensive because i feel good and dont look my age blood fats are still a work in progress the staff are very helpful and questions are answered quickly by knowledgeable people a couple of issues with the app over the past 12 months but sorted very quickly once i asked the team for help one was due to a android update to my phone
Label: Positive

review_text: after the first day i woke up sore the next day lol now on 3rd day and other parts of body sore let go
Label: Negative

review_text: for years i struggled with feeling like there was something just fundamentally wrong but could never put my finger on it i had a string of therapists that never seemed to stick as the labor of getting to and from appointments and the price made it hard to feel like my problems were worth the effortthen almost on a whim i signed up for cerebral because i figured that maybe the free diagnostic would put a name to my feelings the care team i was partnered to was instantly in my corner i felt truly heard for the first time and was approached with empathy and a mindset towards finding my comfort never about fixing me or making me feel broken i have been with cerebral for a couple of months now and the gently insistent reminders for appointments with my care team helps keep me on track for my goals without feeling like im being pressured and helps me get the most out of my care i cant promise a universal experience but for me at least i feel more whole and satisfied with myself than i can ever remember feeling and it wouldnt have happened without this team of people looking out for me
Label: Positive

review_text: this has been without a doubt the absolute worst excuse for a medical provider i have ever encounteredi started with circle medical for an adhd evaluation they performed this service and then referred me out to cerebral i started on the medicationtherapy plan for which cerebral claims anthem and other companies are innetwork and they will directly bill your insurancefirst the billing piece is a lie they never submitted a claim to my insurance until i tried to submit the other plans invoices which took months to get from cerebral because the receipts they give you are not insurance compliant the claims they did submit did not match the dates or prices on my invoices basically they charged me 139 and told my insurance theyd billed me 255 if you do the medicationcare counseling plan they will not bill your insurance or provide invoices you can submit to your insurance unless you hound them about it and after all that anthem at least refuses to accept the claims because cerebral is innetwork but doesnt bill them directlysecond i switched off the therapy plan because youre paying for four therapy sessions a month i got one session in over a monthlong period cerebral needed to reassign my therapist i guess and took a month to do so and then assigned someone random originally you get to pick based on their profilespecialties with no nearterm availabilitythird the actual services are not great it took seven months to get any adjustment in my medication when the entire purpose of the service was medication management i had been on the same medications for over a year starting about eight months before signing up with cerebral without progress before i finally got changes in my medication the prescriber clearly never read my file and would argue with me about strange things like saying id been prescribed a medication for adhd that id been taking for years before ever being diagnosed with adhd the care counselor was good but that was the only positivecustomer service is not very responsive and definitely not helpful theyll go back and forth with you for weeks in their chat before telling you to email someone specific instead i couldnt even get them to give me my prescribers phone number when my own doctor requested it because the prescriber told me to ask them to write my prescriptions since she cant telehealth providers can no longer prescribe controlled substances like stimulant medications instead they took two weeks to send me my own medical recordsthis has been a horrible horrible experience i shouldve been able to easily submit my invoices for reimbursement and i cant get any of them processed because of cerebrals sketchy billing which leaves me out over 1000 i never would have paid if i had known it would go this way avoideta the prompt response to a critical review is admirable but for the fact that ive been in correspondence with them for literal months about all of this i just spent 30 more minutes on messaging cerebral and anthem about the exact same issues oh and i wanted to add that ive just discovered that my prescriber was misgendering me a trans person in my medical records the amount of stress this behavioral health service has caused and the amount of time ive wasted dealing with them and my insurance to get nowhere again avoid
Label: Negative

review_text: this service was great in the beginning then a few months in it wasnt this was fraud and a farce monthly payments to speak to someone at inconvenient times months apart care councilor only ever asked me if my medication was working she spent the entire 30 minutes on that one question and typing she would ask me the same questions about my medication in that same session over and over after a while i stopped attending my opinion is she was multitasking she was definitely working on other things as 30 minutes to type a one sentence response for that same question is ridiculous actually the one time i was sobbing and  needed to talk she was unfazed and cold and told me i had 15 minutes left so i never opened up to her again i only kept cerebral this long because of my medication but then i stopped receiving those too i havent seen a bottle of medication in about 8 weeks last refill was december 9th and its february 2nd once your class action suits begin i will gladly be joining them this is fraud and someone is eventually going to do something about it or worse someone is going to end up hurting themselves or another with the way this company operates its only a matter of time daily mail did an entire article about the cerebral fraud a mere month ago more and more people are catching up on the garbage this has turned into

review_text: i have been a month with zoe and so far it has been the most informative nutrition study i have experienced it is expensive but a great investment for once healthit takes a little time to find out where things are in the app but eventually one gets there the nutrition team is amazing very helpful kind and supportive i have realised how much i was always eating the same foods and introduced many new things and tastes in my diet which make my meals much more exciting i havent lost weight but this is my own fault for getting a bit carried away and wanting to eat too many different things in one meal only one downside one cannot log any supplements and at least in my case i get a lot of mushroom capsules that could count as plant diversity perhaps in the future something else that could be helpful is to be able to print recipes and all the information we get on the app so one can have their little printed file much easier to go to than on the phone mostly when cooking a recipe everyone should do it at least once i wish as well that there was a possibility of doing a gut test regularly to see progress and adjust what needs to be adjusted hopefully a possibility soon a great experience so far and highly recommended
Label: Positive

review_text: i joined zoe as my sister in law said she had really benefited from following the programme i was a little sceptical as to the effects as we already ate a healthy balanced diet but it has been fascinating learning the effect of individual foods and my husband and i have changed our diet more extensively than i expected with the result that i have both lost weight and now feel much more energetic  its perhaps not quite as personalised as it suggests but overall its been a hugely worthwhile experience and i will certainly stick with the changes weve made  ive been busy recommending zoe to anyone who will listen

review_text: this company preys upon people who are trying to improve their mental health i was excited to start therapy and do it from the comfort of my home i signed up in dec 2021 and had one therapy session which was solely centered around medications not about me i decided to give it a month and try it out i didnt notice any difference being on the medications but you have to make an appointment each month to keep up with the meds and i thought maybe it takes time to work so when i went to make an appointment for the next month there was no availability so not only was i paying 85 for the month and not getting the service i also couldnt continue the medication i decided it was time to cancel but there is nowhere on the app or website to cancel i tried to call and all you can get is a machine i couldnt talk to anyone i finally found that you have to email them to cancel your subscription which i did and never received a reply they of course continued to charge me for 5 months and i never would get a reply when emailing them i finally cancelled my debit card to try to get them to stop charging me which still didnt work i finally emailed them again telling them that i had reported them to the better business bureau and that i would be contacting an attorney next if they still refuse to cancel my subscription they emailed me back 10 minutes later on a sunday at 7p on memorial day weekend if they are responding to me on a holiday weekend they obviously read my previous emails to cancel and chose to ignore them this is disgusting i feel taken advantage of by trying to improve my mental health and better myself this has been such a hassle and i couldnt believe a company could be this awful i wouldnt recommend this company to anyone ever
Label: Negative

review_text: unfair and not customerorientedi am extremely disappointed with bettermes customer service and subscription practices on december 5 2024 i was automatically charged 6364 for the renewal of a program i immediately canceled the subscription within 2 hours at 1946 on the same day as i did not intend to continue however despite multiple attempts to reach out to their customer service i sent 3 emails with no response i have yet to receive any acknowledgment or refundmoreover i was not given any prior notification about the upcoming renewal which is not only poor customer service but also goes against eu consumer protection laws which require at least 3 days notice before automatic billingto make matters worse i was unable to fully use the 28day discounted program i had purchased due to health reasons and now due to the unresponsive customer service and lack of transparency i will not be able to continue with the service at alli feel completely disregarded and unvalued as a customer the companys lack of communication and failure to refund a service i did not use is unacceptable i would strongly advise others to avoid paying with credit or debit cards when subscribing to betterme instead use paypal where you have better protection for transactions if you do choose paypal make sure to cancel the automatic payment directly on your paypal account as simply canceling it on the betterme website is not sufficienti would strongly advise others to reconsider using betterme until they improve their customer service and transparency

review_text: i came to cereberal after what i would like to call a bad breakup  i was trying to use livehealth online to get help with anxiety and anger management issues i have had for a long time  when treated by livehealth it was hard to find anyone to talk to and when i finally did after waiting months it was again several months before out next session  by which the therapist had forgotten me and it felt like day one all over again  finding cereberal has been a blessing  when i signed up for service i had a consultation same day on a sunday then 2 days later spoke with my therapist who has always listened to my needs and made sure that things are being kept up for me  i cannot recommend the service enough to anyone who is thinking they might need some help  cereberal makes a difference and treats mental health the way it should be

review_text: i joined zoe after almost a year of cleaning up my diet with the hope of fine tuning my nutrition it was a lot of money to join zoe but now i feel that it was worth everything i spent on it i have to admit that i did not like the cookies test because the taste was so sweet however the blood test and gut test were straight forward the results came back quickly and were extremely detailed it gave me a huge insight about my gut health i got my individual scores and then the meal planning started i realised how my zoe scores helped implement effective meal planning and therefore were giving me very healthy cgm traces the support by staff and nutritionists was fantastic recently i had some questions about calcium intake and holly was able to provide with some great resources furthermore she answered other queries about tips of fasting in ramadhan and lists of foods that were rich in certain electrolytes she made me feel comfortable at asking questions that is exactly how client support should be thank you holly all the staff have been and were extremely patient with my detailed and complicated questions with every question and their help i felt more enlightened my knowledge developed by the extremely thorough daily lessons on the app and the recipe ideas podcasts material from zoe staff on studies etc there is a lot of information which i absolutely loved it was easy to grasp more so the zoe podcast and interviews with the zoe scientists have been exceptionally intriguing i am learning so much i am applying the knowledge to my family too in fact i am now encouraging my husband to join zoe i think the zoe program is the breakthrough we needed its the best program by far its so thorough its the detail we needed its the lateral thinking we needed its the approach where we needed to put the pieces of puzzles together rather than a single ideation which so many programs have furthermore most programs are too restrictive zoe ticks all the boxes in this program its common sense and a lot of logic behind planning meals that are diverse a crucial step for our microbiome its backed up by their hard work and so many fantastic studies thank you zoe thank you to your amazing scientists like professor tim spector
Label: Positive

review_text: i have learnt so much about my body and how food interacts with it i already feel more alert and energised at 65 i thought that having a mid afternoon nap was the norm i havent had one since starting zoe properly i had operator issues initially and the support team were very understanding and helpful
Label: Positive

review_text: to start with the positives the programme worked technically well app tests i didnt have any issues there was support available when i had questions they were answered quicklyunfortunately i didnt learn much new from the programme i didnt get much out of wearing the blood sugar monitor the results are not that easy to interpret if youre not an expert and as the readings are in a different app then where you log your meals and you cant log exercise at all its quite difficult to draw any conclusionsthe advice on meals i got based on my test results was basically what i already knew about healthy eating i didnt find the lessons that useful they didnt contain that much information and were sometimes a bit patronising logging meals is a lot of effort the app could be improved and it shows your daily calorie intake which is not helpful if youre trying to move away from a calorie based dietso all in all the programme is ok and maybe useful if you have a fairly unhealthy diet and try to overhaul it or if you find out something surprising from the tests but i expected a bit more for the price
Label: Neutral

review_text: this is a great evidence based programme the testing period was such an eye opener  i now understand exactly why my old eating habits were so bad for me i immediately benefited from starting the personalized diet my joint pain reduced by 50 before id even lost any weight slowly loosing weight 6 weeks in but feels totally sustainable the information and advice is first class ive sometimes found the food logging a bit glitchy but on the whole its good making time for food prep has been a little stressful but im learning all the time and am starting to build a portfolio of easy hacks
Label: Positive

review_text: im 8 weeks into my years subscription so far so good im learning how to build up a healthy series of balanced meals including more plants my objective is to improve my ibs and be more energised and thats happening im also losing weight slowly as my eating habits change ive listened to the zoe podcasts for 18months so had changed  lots of things already my intention is a lasting improvement the app provides a lot of personalised feedback on progress and tips to adapt  modify meals for improved nutrition

review_text: ive been on the zoe programme for a few months my goals were to lose some weight 56kg feel a little more lively eat a bit better and feel a little less bloated  more comfortable ive achieved this and things are still getting betteri really like the zoe approach its grounded in science but takes an approach that is accessible to most people im slowly improving supported when needed by the team at zoe that includes nutritionalists and techy people responses have been on the whole reasonably quickif you are thinking about doing this it does take a good amount of time and commitment and does cost  do note that zoe isnt perfect the app changes as the scientists learn and adjust the way it works  some will find this disconcerting but i am reassured by this some things feel like they need a little more time spent on them which im sure is happening overall im glad i took the plunge
Label: Positive

review_text: this is an evolving science the zoe programme takes quite a bit of work and time i wouldnt have managed it when i worked full time with a family  but how i wish it had been around when i was much youngerthe testing is fascinating  the lessons are irritating  the app is ok but takes some getting used to though it is improving all the time i have lost weight and stopped the relentless weight gain that seems to come with age  i feel so much better and hopefully i can keep the weight controlled nowzoe seems expensive but we are a nation cushioned from real costs of healthcare by the nhs and money can be saved by eating more simply and better on the eating plan  costs one expensive take away coffee a dayi think zoe will be very different in a year from now so i am interested to see how it evolves
Label: Positive
